courseSectionInformation: 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. 1 to 4 graduate hours. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours, with a maximum of 8 hours in any one term. Prerequisite: consent of instructor.
description: Individual studies in any area of theoretical and applied mechanics. 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. 1 to 4 graduate hours. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours, with a maximum of 8 hours in any one term. Prerequisite: consent of instructor.
label: Independent Study
